term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 11/4/2003--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to authorize deductions of Medicare part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) premiums from social security benefits payments only for coverage in the same month in which the deduction is made (and not for a subsequent month).
